text: Just a PSA: I had an appt at 10:30 am, and was not seen until 11:30. I had to wait an HOUR, and they don't tell you this when you start the consultation, but each dermatology appt is scheduled for 15 mins. So, if you talk for more than 15 mins (which I did chatting about life), there is around an ~$80 charge up to the dr's discretion. I asked the front desk where is the sign that says that info, and they pointed to where the sign says "and above".... üßêüßê

Dr Goh and his team are just amazing. I've visited other clinic but their compassionate approach has made a world of difference to me personally.

Dr God is gentle and knowledgeable, I highly recommend this clinic.

Horrible place. Only come here if you are willing to spend 1+ hour of your life waiting (even if you have an appointment and arrive early). Please go somewhere else that respects your time, and also has a more reasonable consultation rate.

long waiting time (waited 45mins) just to see the doctor and all doctor said was there is nothing he can do neither nor they have any medication/ cream for treating infected toe nail. one of the front desk was also not friendly when i requested for a memo writing my diagnosis.
Dr Goh is very professional. His diagnosis and prescription is so good that successfully cured my problem (which lasted for two years) with just one visit
